name: Photos
description:
Search and insert photos into your Figma files


Features

  • Search photos (including gifs) from Unsplash, Google, Flickr, Pixabay, Pexels, Giphy and Tenor
  • Place photos on the page or insert in layers
  • Select and insert multiple photos at once
  • Quickly insert a random set of photos
  • See which photos you have inserted and find back the original files
  • Supported in both Figma and FigJam


Free version

  • Unlimited photos from Unsplash in FigJam
  • 20 photos per file from Unsplash, Pixabay, Pexels, Giphy and Tenor


Basic Account

  • Unlimited photos from Unsplash, Pixabay, Pexels, Giphy and Tenor
  • 20 photos per file from Flickr and Google


Pro Account

  • Unlimited photos from Unsplash, Pixabay, Pexels, Flickr, Google, Giphy and Tenor


Notes

  • Photo and user/info links can be found below the images
  • When using Google or Flickr photos, make sure to review the license information for both commercial and non-commercial use
